p: For evolutionary analysis, the most abundant B3 dataset (25 complete genomes) was input to BEAST [ 17] together with the corresponding sampling dates. The mutation rate was calculated using the general time-reversible (GTR) model [ 18], a relaxed molecular clock, and a coalescent/exponential growth tree prior. The phylogenetic results were further confirmed by repeating the analysis with different substitution models and prior and molecular clock parametrizations.
